step1.para: Chock wheels.
Drain cooling system.
Remove both charge air cooler pipes/hoses.
Remove upper radiator hose. Disconnect overflow hose from thermostat housing area.
Using suitable tool (table, etc.), support hood.
Remove upper radiator support strut rods. Disconnect lower radiator support strut rods at radiator.

note.para: On upper radiator support strut rods, loosen the outer nuts only. This will prevent the need to align the radiator assembly and hood. Weight of hood will move the radiator assembly forward for access to fan/clutch.

step1.para: Remove fan/clutch using special tools.
Loosen water pump pulley bolts.
Remove serpentine belt.
Remove water pump pulley.
Remove belt tensioner.
Disconnect lower radiator hose, surge tank hose and heater hose from water pump.
Remove belt idler pulley from water pump.
Remove coolant filter.
Remove bolts retaining water pump. Remove water pump. Note length and location of bolts.
Transfer fittings and thermostat/housing with new gasket.
Clean water pump mating surface on front cover.
Install water pump with new gasket. Torque bolts.

note.para: Be sure water pump rotates freely after installation.

step1.para: Install coolant filter.
Install belt idler pulley to water pump. Torque bolt.
Connect lower radiator hose, surge tank hose and heater hose to water pump.
Install belt tensioner. Torque bolt.
Install water pump pulley. Torque bolts.

note.para: Use oil filter strap wrench around pulley and secure. This will prevent the pulley from turning.

step1.para: Install serpentine belt.
Install fan/clutch assembly using special tools.
Connect lower radiator support strut rods to radiator frame. Install upper radiator support strut rods. Remove hood support.
Install upper radiator hose. Connect overflow hose to thermostat housing area.
Install both charge air cooler pipes/hoses.
Fill cooling system.
Start vehicle. Check for coolant leaks.
Remove wheel chocks.
